product-description-content:
Protègenet is an aluminum window sill system. It protects window sills and facades. It can be used in new construction as well as renovation. The system consists of a window sill with rounded edge and finishing tips.
Open the product page: Link here
Open photo galery: Gallery
product-description-extra:
Shipping times
(Delivery times subject to available stock – the exact shipping date will be communicated to you after validation of your order)
Delivery time normal: ex factory within 10 working days
Stock colors: ex factory within 5 working days for the following finishes: raw, anodized, lacquered aluminum RAL 1015, 7016, 9010, 9016
